TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit DBNull extends System.Object implements class System.IConvertible, class System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable
Public NotInheritable Class DBNull Implements IConvertible, ISerializable
public ref class DBNull sealed : IConvertible, System::Runtime::Serialization::ISerializable
type DBNull = class interface ISerializable interface IConvertible

span.span: Represents a nonexistent value.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別代表不存在的值。The class represents a nonexistent value. 比方說，在資料庫中，資料表的資料列中的資料行可能不會包含任何資料。In a database, for example, a column in a row of a table might not contain any data whatsoever. 也就是說，資料行視為完全不存在，而不只沒有值。That is, the column is considered to not exist at all instead of merely not having a value. A物件代表不存在的資料行。A object represents the nonexistent column. 此外，會使用 COM interop區別 VT_NULL variant，這表示不存在的值和 VT_EMPTY variant，表示未指定的值的類別。Additionally, COM interop uses the class to distinguish between a VT_NULL variant, which indicates a nonexistent value, and a VT_EMPTY variant, which indicates an unspecified value. 類型為單一類別，這表示只有一個物件存在。The type is a singleton class, which means only one object exists. 成員代表唯一物件。The member represents the sole object. 可用來明確地將不存在的值指派給資料庫欄位中，雖然大部分的 ADO.NET 資料提供者會自動指派的值當欄位沒有有效的值。 can be used to explicitly assign a nonexistent value to a database field, although most ADO.NET data providers automatically assign values of when a field does not have a valid value. 您可以判斷擷取自資料庫欄位的值是否值傳遞至該欄位的值`DBNull.Value.Equals`方法。You can determine whether a value retrieved from a database field is a value by passing the value of that field to the `DBNull.Value.Equals` method. 不過，有些語言和資料庫物件提供方法，讓您更輕鬆地判斷資料庫欄位的值是否為。However, some languages and database objects supply methods that make it easier to determine whether the value of a database field is . 這些包括 Visual Basic`IsDBNull`函式，方法，方法，而方法。These include the Visual Basic `IsDBNull` function, the method, the method, and the method. 請勿混淆的概念`null`物件導向程式設計語言，與物件。Do not confuse the notion of `null` in an object-oriented programming language with a object. 在物件導向程式設計語言中，`null`表示物件的參考不存在。In an object-oriented programming language, `null` means the absence of a reference to an object. 代表未初始化的變數或不存在的資料庫資料行。 represents an uninitialized variant or nonexistent database column. ## Examples 下列範例會呼叫`DBNull.Value.Equals`方法來判斷資料庫中的欄位連絡人資料庫是否有有效的值。The following example calls the `DBNull.Value.Equals` method to determine whether a database field in a contacts database has a valid value. 若是如此，請將欄位值被附加至標籤中的字串輸出。If it does, the field value is appended to the string output in a label. [!code-csharp[System.DBNull.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.DBNull.Class/cs/DBNullExamples.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.DBNull.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.DBNull.Class/vb/DBNullExamples.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 支援三種轉換： 如果`type`參數會指定或，則傳回值是目前物件本身。Three conversions are supported: If the `type` parameter specifies or , the return value is the current object itself. 如果`type`參數會指定，則傳回值是所傳回的字串方法。If the `type` parameter specifies , the return value is the string returned by the method.

exception.span: This conversion is not supported for the type.

span.span: This conversion is not supported for the type.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.DBNull Value
Public Shared ReadOnly Value As DBNull

summary.span: Represents the sole instance of the class.

span.span: Represents the sole instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是單一類別，這表示這個此類別的執行個體可以存在。 is a singleton class, which means only this instance of this class can exist. 如果資料庫欄位有遺失資料，您可以使用屬性來明確地指派物件欄位的值。If a database field has missing data, you can use the property to explicitly assign a object value to the field. 不過，大部分的資料提供者自動執行此動作。However, most data providers do this automatically. 若要評估以判斷其值是否為資料庫欄位，您可以將欄位值傳遞`DBNull.Value.Equals`方法。To evaluate database fields to determine whether their values are , you can pass the field value to the `DBNull.Value.Equals` method. 不過，因為有其他方式來評估資料遺失的資料庫欄位的數字，很少使用這個方法。However, this method is rarely used because there are a number of other ways to evaluate a database field for missing data. 這些包括 Visual Basic`IsDBNull`函式，方法，方法， ，以及其他幾個方法。These include the Visual Basic `IsDBNull` function, the method, the method, the method, and several other methods. ## Examples 下列範例會呼叫`DBNull.Value.Equals`方法來判斷資料庫中的欄位連絡人資料庫是否有有效的值。The following example calls the `DBNull.Value.Equals` method to determine whether a database field in a contacts database has a valid value. 若是如此，請將欄位值被附加至標籤中的字串輸出。If it does, the field value is appended to the string output in a label. [!code-csharp[System.DBNull.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.DBNull.Class/cs/DBNullExamples.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.DBNull.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.DBNull.Class/vb/DBNullExamples.vb#1)]
